title: Donald Trump rumored to be coming to NYC to watch a UFC fight
text:
President Donald Trump is rumored to staying in New York this weekend to watch a UFC fight.

Trump's tentative plans for this weekend were tweeted out on Tuesday by a New York Times reporter.

His visit to the city would take place on a weekend where traffic chaos is already expected due to the New York City Marathon taking place on Sunday, sources said.

It would also come just one week after he was booed heavily when he arrived at Game 5 of the World Series in Washington D.C.

President Donald Trump is rumored to staying in New York this weekend to watch a UFC fight

Trump's rumored plans include arriving in New York on Saturday night to attend the UFC fight between Nate Diaz and Jorge Masvidal at Madison Square Gardens.

Sources say he would then spend the night at his Trump Tower home, which is close to the marathon route that finishes in Central Park.

Trump has only stayed in his New York apartment a handful of times since becoming President.

He was invited to attend a fight at MSG back in 2016 but declined after his Secret Service flagged security concerns.

Trump is friends with UFC president Dana White and was invited by him to attend a fight at MSG in 2016. Trump declined after his Secret Service flagged security concerns

Trump had been invited that time by UFC president and friend Dana White.

White visited Trump in the White House last summer with UFC fighter Colby Covington.

The UFC president also publicly supported him during the election by speaking at the Republican National Convention in 2016.

The UFC has not yet confirmed if Trump will be attending the fight on Saturday night.
description: President Donald Trump is rumored to staying in New York at Trump Tower this weekend to watch a UFC fight at Madison Square Gardens.
